io.micronaut.security.session

Class SessionAuthorizationExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.authentication.DefaultAuthorizationExceptionHandler
      • io.micronaut.security.session.SessionAuthorizationExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.http.server.exceptions.ExceptionHandler<AuthorizationException,io.micronaut.http.MutableHttpResponse<?>>

    @Singleton
 @Replaces(value=DefaultAuthorizationExceptionHandler.class)
public class SessionAuthorizationExceptionHandler
extends DefaultAuthorizationExceptionHandler
    An ExceptionHandler for AuthorizationException that redirects to a configured URI.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
